prompts: Create a magnetic Pokemon that can levitate with a sleek, metallic design and bright colors.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small magnet with unique powers and a quirky personality.
Generate a steel-type Pokemon that has a round shape and can generate electricity.
Make a cute, compact Pokemon that features magnetic forces and has a shiny metallic finish.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique combination of steel and electric types, perfect for battles.
Design a Pokemon that can attract objects with magnets and has a friendly demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the concept of magnetism with vibrant colors and a fun design.
